alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:26PM EST until January 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Shoal River Near Crestview affecting Okaloosa County. For the Shoal River...including Crestview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shoal River near Crestview. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Water in yards on Sowel Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 8.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
